name: Tonic Audio
description: Tonic Audio is a collaboration platform for audio creators, taking the music creation process from a solo to a multi-player experience, and makes it as straight-forward and intuitive as jamming in a room with your band mates.
one_liner: Tonic Audio is a collaboration platform for audio creators, taking the music creation process from a solo to a multi-player experience, and makes it as straight-forward and intuitive as jamming in a room with your band mates.
